member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO
member.summary: Describes the format of the returned by .

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO.Size
member.summary: Size of this structure.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO.Creator
member.summary: Offset to LPCSTR for compiler version.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO.EntrypointName
member.summary: Offset to LPCSTR for Entry point name.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO.ShaderTarget
member.summary: Offset to LPCSTR for shader target.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO.CompileFlags
member.summary: Flags used to compile.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO.Files
member.summary: Number of included files.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO.FileInfo
member.summary: Offset to array of structures that has Files elements.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO.Instructions
member.summary: Number of instructions.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO.InstructionInfo
member.summary: Offset to array of structures that has Instructions elements.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO.Variables
member.summary: Number of variables.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO.VariableInfo
member.summary: Offset to array of structures that has Variables elements.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO.InputVariables
member.summary: Number of variables to initialize before running.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO.InputVariableInfo
member.summary: Offset to array of structures that has InputVariables elements.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO.Tokens
member.summary: Number of tokens to initialize.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO.TokenInfo
member.summary: Offset to array of structures that has Tokens elements.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO.Scopes
member.summary: Number of scopes.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO.ScopeInfo
member.summary: Offset to array of structures that has Scopes elements.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO.ScopeVariables
member.summary: Number of variables declared.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO.ScopeVariableInfo
member.summary: Offset to array of structures that has Scopes elements.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO.UintOffset
member.summary: Offset to the UINT datastore, all UINT offsets are from this offset.

member.name: D3D10_SHADER_DEBUG_INFO.StringOffset
member.summary: Offset to the string datastore, all string offsets are from this offset.
